original_text: So you shall also present a contribution to the Lord from all your tithes, which you receive from the people of Israel. And from it you shall give the Lord's contribution to Aaron the priest.
korean_text: 너희는 이스라엘 자손에게서 받는 모든 것의 십일조 중에서 여호와께 거제로 드리고 여호와께 드린 그 거제물은 제사장 아론에게로 돌리되

sentences.original_text: So you shall also present a contribution to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 또한 주께 헌물을 드려야 하느니라

sentences.original_text: which you receive from the people of Israel
you shall give the Lord's contribution
